DES_HOME:
Welcome to discoverasr.com, the home of 200+ ASR properties across 13 brands.

Explore the world with our virtual arcade and weekly flash sale from 12 July to 24 September 2021.

Select a country to start playing. Win up to 1,400 ASR points and lucky draw chances for our 11 NFT prizes!
DES_HOME_MOBILE:
Welcome to discoverasr.com, the home of 200+ ASR properties across 13 brands.

Explore the world with our virtual arcade. Start playing to win ASR points and NFT prizes!

GREETINGS.title: Nice to meet you!
GREETINGS.description: I'm Cubby, your butler, and I'll be guiding you on this journey to explore different destinations. Get up to 1,400 ASR points and NFT lucky draw chances when you complete our mini games.

COMEBACK.title: Welcome back!
COMEBACK.description: Keep playing the mini games to earn more NFT lucky draw chances.

VIETNAM.title: Welcome to Vietnam!
VIETNAM.description: The white sandy beaches and clear waters are never far when you’re at Nha Trang.

games.title: Vietnam
games.desc: The Nha Trang Bay has a total of 19 islets and islands. One of them is called _______.
games.textLucky: Fun fact: Locally known as Hon Lao Island, take a ferry ride to this desert island and meet over 1,000 adorable monkeys when staying at Citadines Bayfront Nha Trang.

PHILIPPINES.title: Welcome to Philippines!
PHILIPPINES.description: Not only is Cebu its oldest city, it's also one of the world's best-preserved Spanish colonial towns.

games.title: Philippines
games.desc: Malapascua Island, one of Cebu’s many beaches is the only place in the world that you can see _____ all year round.
games.textLucky: Fun fact: If you’re heading to Malapascua Island from Citadines Cebu City, it's best to plan your trip during the dry season, between December and June.

INDONESIA.title: Welcome to Indonesia!
INDONESIA.description: Made up of over 17,000 islands, Bali is just one of the many picturesque islands here.

games.title: Indonesia
games.desc: The world's most expensive coffee comes from Bali, where the beans are  _______.
games.textLucky: Fun fact: Apart from walks on the beach, YELLO Kuta Beachwalk Bali features 147 unique street-art-inspired rooms with gaming stations.

JAPAN.title: Welcome to Japan!
JAPAN.description: Savour the finer flavours of Fukuoka, one of the country’s best food cities and second only to Tokyo for the highest concentration of restaurants.

games.title: Japan
games.desc: Famous for Tonkotsu ramen, Fukuoka quickly became the _____ of Japan.
games.textLucky: Fun fact: You can find many ramen stalls surrounding lyf Tenjin Fukuoka. Most of them will take your orders through vending machines!

INDIA.title: Welcome to India!
INDIA.description: Explore the many ancient temples, vibrant arts and bustling culinary scene that makes Chennai, the capital of Tamil Nadu.

games.title: India
games.desc:
The street food of Chennai is a must-try! See if you can identify them.


Drag and reorder the dishes to their matching pictures.
games.textLucky: Fun fact: Enjoy popular Indian dishes at Delhi Highway, located conveniently at the lobby level of Citadines OMR Chennai.

USA.title: Welcome to USA!
USA.description: Home to the 7th busiest subway system, New York has a whopping total of 472 train stations right now.

games.title: USA
games.desc:
Let’s see how well you can find your way through New York’s intricate subway system!


Drag and reorder the stations to their matching train lines.
games.textLucky: Fun fact: All our rooms at Citadines Connect Fifth Avenue New York feature New York subway tiles in the newly remodelled bathrooms.

KOREA.title: Welcome to Korea!
KOREA.description: Its capital city, Seoul, is a wondrous blend of old and new, with high-tech districts amidst ancient palaces.

games.title: Korea
games.desc:
How well do you know the palaces of Seoul? Guess which of these statements is true or false.


Drag and reorder the answers to their matching statements.
games.textLucky: Fun fact: From Somerset Palace Seoul, you can take a 10-minute car ride to Changdeok Palace, one of Korea’s five grand palaces and a UNESCO World Heritage site.

answers.key: Free admission if you wear a Hanbok

FRANCE.title: Welcome to France!
FRANCE.description: Come experience the Parisian life and wake up to views of the Champs-Élysées from a 5-star hotel.

games.title: France
games.desc: Where's Cubby? Take a virtual tour of La Clef Champs-Elysess Paris and count how many times Cubby appears!
games.textLucky: Fun fact: The essence of La Clef Champs-Élysées Paris is best described as a timeless fragrance. As such, we’ve built an in-house perfume bar at the lobby!

THAILAND.title: Welcome to Thailand!
THAILAND.description: The popular Sriracha hot sauce was actually named after one of its seaside cities, Si Racha.

games.title: Thailand
games.desc: Where's Cubby? Take a virtual tour of Somerset Harbourview Sri Racha and count how many times Cubby appears!
games.textLucky: Fun fact: If you’re planning to take a dip after a long day of work, head up to our infinity pool at around 6.30pm to capture an amazing sunset view.

SINGAPORE.title: Welcome to Singapore!
SINGAPORE.description: From fine dining to hawker fare, Singapore is a food paradise that’s known for its culinary diversity.

games.title: Singapore
games.desc: Where's Cubby? Take a virtual tour of Citadines Balestier Singapore and count how many times Cubby appears!
games.textLucky: Fun fact: Besides Citadines Balestier Singapore is a foodie hotspot called Whampoa Hawker Centre! Try local delights like laksa noodles and rojak with jellyfish there.

AUSTRALIA.title: Welcome to Australia!
AUSTRALIA.description: With more than half of all Australians owning pets, Melbourne is the purfect place for you and your four-legged friend.

games.title: Australia
games.desc:
Can you spot the 3 differences in one of our apartments below?


Memorise the picture, start the timer and tap the differences to mark them.
games.textLucky: Fun fact: All our pet friendly rooms in Citadines on Bourke Melbourne come with a pet bed, food, water bowls and access to the rooftop courtyard.

MALAYSIA.title: Welcome to Malaysia!
MALAYSIA.description: Here you’ll find the world's tallest twin skyscrapers in Kuala Lumpur, and beautiful mosques across the country.

games.title: Malaysia
games.desc:
Can you spot the 3 differences in one of our apartments below?


Memorise the picture, start the timer and tap the differences to mark them.
games.textLucky: Fun fact: Just north of Ascott Kuala Lumpur, you can find the Batu Caves! These limestone caverns are said to be around 400 million years old.

CHINA.title: Welcome to China!
CHINA.description: Discover the grand Forbidden City and 3,000 years of recorded history at the heart of Beijing.

games.title: China
games.desc:
Can you spot all 3 differences in our luxury apartment below?


Memorise the picture, start the timer and tap the differences to mark them.
games.textLucky: Fun fact: Great for families, Ascott Riverside Garden Beijing is just a stone’s throw from shopping malls and leisure attractions like Happy Valley theme park and Panjiayuan Antique Market.

DUBAI.title: Welcome to UAE!
DUBAI.description: Did you know Dubai was mostly a desert just 20 years ago? Today, it's filled with luxury shopping, modern architecture, and lively nightlife scenes.

games.title: UAE
games.desc:
Can you spot all 3 differences in our swimming pool below?


Memorise the picture, start the timer and tap the differences to mark them.
games.textLucky: Fun fact: The swimming pool at Ascott Park Place Dubai is temperature controlled, 40-metre long and housed within the iconic 56-storey Park Place Tower.
